channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Markets may be past peak tariff uncertainty, even as investors weigh new tax on auto imports and brace for ‘Liberation Day’
item.description: The “American exceptionalism” trade might not be dead yet, fund managers told Fortune.

item.title: Publishers, journalists and film producers attack ‘fundamentally flawed’ plan for enforcing Europe’s new AI law
item.description: Draft guidance for AI companies won't ensure that they comply with the AI Act or EU copyright law, say rightsholders.

item.title: MrBeast told Mark Zuckerberg the first thing he would change if he ran Meta—and the CEO agreed
item.description: In a joint interview, YouTube sensation MrBeast and Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg swapped thoughts on reaching audiences with video.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried parts ways with ‘Diddy’ as feds transfer crypto conman from Brooklyn prison to Oklahoma
item.description: The former FTX CEO is presumably en route to California, where his parents live.

item.title: Doja Cat and Charli XCX’s agent on her groundbreaking career in the music industry
item.description: 'I always wanted to run everything,' says Jenna Adler.

item.title: U.S. stocks set to open lower after PCE gauge reflects persistence of inflation
Nvidia sees $200 million in market cap vanish ahead of CoreWeave debut
Fed-preferred PCE gauge shows uptick in core annual inflation rate — follow live
U.S. consumer sentiment falls to lowest level since 2022
This CEO may have cost his investors $661 million. Trump just pardoned him.
